verses.roman:
bālya-kāla haite mora svabhāva eka haya
nāmera mahimā-śāstra kariye sañcaya

synonyms: bālya-kāla haite—from my childhood; mora—my; svabhāva—practice; eka—one; haya—there is; nāmera—of the holy name; mahimā—concerning the glories; śāstra—the revealed scriptures; kariye sañcaya—I collect.
translation: "From my childhood I have been practicing this chanting and have been collecting the glories of the holy name from revealed scriptures.
